amendment.description: To adjust the boundaries of Green Mountain National Forest.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3217 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3217 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S5847; text: CR S5847) To adjust the boundaries of Green Mountain National Forest.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3217 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Leahy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3217 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
